Module com.example.dmscoursework
Package com.example.dmscoursework.View.Brick

Class Brick.Crack

java.lang.Object
com.example.dmscoursework.View.Brick.Brick.Crack
Enclosing class:
Brick
public class Brick.Crack extends Object
A Crack is a line that runs down the brick in order to show that it has been impacted and that it is nearly broken.

  • Constructor Details

    • Crack

      public Crack(int crackDepth, int steps)
      Constructs a crack whose depth is specified by an integer argument, and height and width are calculated using an integer.
      Parameters:
      crackDepth - an integer, Intensity of zigzags in the crack.
      steps - an integer, Number of zigzags in the crack.

  • Method Details

    • GetM_CrackPath

      public javafx.scene.shape.Path GetM_CrackPath()
      Gets the path of the crack.
      Returns:
      a Path, which is the path of the crack.

    • Reset

      public void Reset()
      Resets the crack, so that there is no crack in brick.

    • MakeCrack

      public void MakeCrack(javafx.geometry.Point2D point, int direction)
      Makes an m_Crack by specifying where the m_Brick was impacted by a Point2D argument and gets the direction the m_Brick should m_Crack with an integer argument.
      Parameters:
      point - a Point2D, is the coordinate of where m_Brick was Impact.
      direction - an integer, which is direction m_Brick should m_Crack.
